text: Thubten Zopa Rinpoche (born 1946 â€“ 13 April 2023) was a lama from Nepal. He took his monks vows at Dungkar Monastery in Tibet and has received teachings from many high lamas.Lawudo Gompa - Lama Zopa Rinpoche's Teachers Lama Zopa is the co-founder, with Lama Yeshe, of Kopan Monastery and the FPMT. After the 1984 death of Lama Yeshe, Lama Zopa served as the FPMT's spiritual director. Zopa's books are published by Wisdom Publications. Free books and a vast online collection of his teachings are available from the Lama Yeshe Wisdom Archive. There is an extensive biography of him in the book 'The Lawudo Lama' , by Jamyang Wangmo. He died on 13 April 2023, at the age of 76. ==Related pages== *Dalai Lama *Tibetan Buddhism ==References== ==Other websites== * Lama Yeshe Wisdom Archive * FPMT Category:Tibetan Buddhist lamas Category:Nepalese people Category:1946 births Category:2023 deaths
